content: this easy crochet pattern will help you create a large christmas stocking with super bulky yarn using mostly the double_crochet stitch **supplies you will need** 10 mm crochet hook - super bulky / super chunky / #6 yarn 165 yards - faux fur yarn 38 yards ** key points ** - beginner skill level crochet pattern - one piece stocking - no sew pattern - us crochet terminology - 4 pages pdf - instant download crochet pattern - includes progress photos - size is 7 5 wide by 20 high - basic free crochet pattern available on https //hookfully com/ - gauge = 3″ x 3″ square = 3 row of 5 double_crochet **stitches used** chain chain double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet magic_ring magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet decrease single_crochet 2 together decrease slip_stitch slip_stitch
